column5: APTO Downtrend is still in effect Apto has been below 200 MA for almost a year just look at the weekly chart you will see what I mean The good news is there is a positive divergence in the weekly MACD and weekly RSI Divergences often predict reversals So there is a chance you might see a pop to the upside but at this time it is still a downtrend GL
APTO I believe there is a shareholder meating today
